name: Half Court
description:
Half Court is game about a man, a ball, and a basketball hoop.

That's pretty much all there is to it.

I built it as a prototype for a future project. If you enjoyed it leave a comment and maybe tell me how I can improve it.

Don't feel inclined to pay for it, it is supposed to be freeware. But, if you would like to support a young indie developer who is just starting out, feel free to give a dollar for it. :)

The best way you could support though is to check back later as I create more. I am on Twitter and I have a blog. I will try to post cool stuff like developer updates, screenshots and more. For the best gameplay experience I recommend downloading the game.

Stay tuned for more…

Peace Out.
